divs: Sighting Details I had told my friend if he ever saw a UFO to make sure he told me right away because I would like to see one. One night while he was visiting with my son they came running out of my sons room yelling get outside quick. So we all ran out the door and and there was a craft that had just flew over the house at a slow speed. I told them I thought It was a scrolling sign for advertising. A couple of days later I found out that many people in the sac. area had seen the craft and it had been caught on film by a local news team. This is what we saw, yet at the time I just thought it was too far away to read the letters. It turns out there never were letters, just lights. My daughter and her boyfriend were in the car at the same time a few blocks away and said that it had a boomerang shape to them. To me it had more of an oblong saucer type shape. If you would like more info I suggest you guys check out News 10 they did some research and as far as I know they haven't come up with any answers from the local airports or bases. Finally saw one.
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There were no other sightings in Sacramento on or around November 20th 2008
Summary: Lights overhead low in altitude and moving slowly.
